Blog.post: todae was ok...the day started of fine...p.e first period...played basketball...then when for dental chekup...it was ok...then no csp so got home early...but no one was at home and i didnt bring the key so i had to stay outside home with a full bladder until 5.45pm...sucky...so...juz waitin for the nite to pass...

yesterdae, coincedentally, my younger bro and my boyfren was in the hospital but my younger brother was in kk my boyfren was in Tan Tock Seng Hospital... he had an accident with a car but juz a minor one... i chatted wif him till 3am and i slept at 3.45 am... then i overslept and didnt come to school... missin him... my bro said he saw my boyfren kissin another gal but, i dunno, and i dun wanna noe, i luv him too much to noe... but my bro wont lie...neither wud he... i'm confused...

woah!!! my cousins came todae and i really had fun wif them coz i miss them so much... i promised to bring them out this june holidaes to orchard and buy anything they want... u'll do crazy thngs when u miss someone... i played badminton wif some1 todae... a guy... he is ok... but... at the end of the game... he asked me for my number but i juz gave him my hp number only... i'm only interested in my sweetie... that u don have noe hu... heex... listenin to 'i don wanna noe' by mario winans feat p diddy... cool song... checkit out

haiz...a sunday...always gt nothin to do...so, i went broadband and downloaded smiley central, hot bar and etc...i created a quiz for my frens and so far, they got gd marks...listenin to hayley westenra now...not me actually...my sis to be exact...she cant sing opera...i'm sufferin.....

hmmm...still not used to this thingy but...i will not gv up!!! kimmie lives on...heex...chattin wif my ex-skoolmate frm northland primary...we went to perth together but he forgetten me...how sad...nvm...i'm lame...nothin to talk bout...oh ya...i told my mum bout my dad but she just couldnt say a thing...who could anyway...ok peeps...thats all for now...need to xplore...

woah!!! my dad just sweared for the first time!!! i'm tellin my mum!!! walau!!! my sis play the game then he f*** things up???!!! he said " PUKI MAK KAU LAH!" believe it or not...hell no!!! i swear i'm tellin my mum!!! well, met a new fren at msn... very frenly... now i'm waitin for my mum to come home so my bro can open up the durian and we can eat!!!

wassup peeps...new here and i want to noe more people out there!!! its a big world u noe...got to noe this frm my frens izyan, diyanah and hayden...i hope i can get use to this thing...coz almost everyone in school has this...so thats bout all..and there is a little description of me below love to make frens love listenin to music love colors blue, white and silver love black eyed peas i'm easy to talk to i play the piano and badminton during leisure time i'm a very fun person to hang out wif wanna noe more bout me then those peeps hu got msn, add kimichia_bubble@hotmail.com hope to meet new frens!!!
